name: Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"
description: Dataset containing peak table information for a study discriminating between the odiferous profiles of cotton and polyester fabrics. Collected on a Comprehensive 2-Dimensional Gas Chromatography - Time-of-Flight Mass Spectrometry (GCxGC-TOFMS) instrument. Used in the paper: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric", for testing new data analysis strategies.

citation.text: de la Mata, A. Paulina, et al. "Comprehensive two-dimensional gas chromatographic profiling and chemometric interpretation of the volatile profiles of sweat in knit fabrics." Analytical and bioanalytical chemistry 409.7 (2017): 1905-1913.
